metadata.title: CVE-2020-6816 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
In Mozilla Bleach before 3.12, a mutation XSS in bleach.clean when RCDATAand either svg or math tags are whitelisted and the keyword argumentstrip=False.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-6816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-bleach - 3.2.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-bleach package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.1-2').
